com.cognifide.qa.bb.provider.selenium.webdriver.modifiers.webdriver

Interface WebDriverModifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImplicitTimeoutModifier, MaximizeModifier

    public interface WebDriverModifier
    Describes a modifier for WebDriver instance - it will be triggered during WebDriver creation. Modification can be controlled via shouldModify() method. Order of the execution can be controlled via getOrder() method. Each modifier must be registered in a Guice module using Multibinder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int getOrder()
      Optional method, used to control order of modifications - modificators will be sorted based on the value returned by this method.
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver modify(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver)
      Modifies given instance of WebDriver and passes it further (potentially for additional modifications).
      boolean shouldModify()
      This method can be used to control if the modification should be triggered, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldModify

        boolean shouldModify()
        This method can be used to control if the modification should be triggered, e.g. when a property is set to some value.
        Returns:
        true if the modification should be triggered

      • modify

        org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver modify(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver)
        Modifies given instance of WebDriver and passes it further (potentially for additional modifications).
        Parameters:
        webDriver - instance of the WebDriver that will be modified
        Returns:
        modified WebDriver instance

      • getOrder

        default int getOrder()
        Optional method, used to control order of modifications - modificators will be sorted based on the value returned by this method.
        Returns:
        order of the modification, default is set to 0
